description: Effective leaders make data-driven decisions. This module covers data analysis, interpretation, and application.

key_concepts.definition: Process of evaluating data to extract insights
Process of assigning meaning to data
Process of representing data in a graphical format

generated_text:
"Module 12: Data" (47 minutes, Intermediate)
Effective leaders make data-driven decisions. This module covers data analysis, interpretation, and application. Learn to collect, organize, and visualize data to inform strategic choices, drive business outcomes, and measure performance. Discover how to identify trends, opportunities, and challenges, and develop a data-informed mindset to enhance your leadership skills.
